title: Somerset pork with cream and apples
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '4 boneless pork loin chops', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 large onion, sliced into thin rings', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 Cox apple, cored and cut into thick rings', '1 red apple, cored and cut into rings', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', 'salt and pepper to taste', '250ml dry cider', '3 tablespoons double cream']
